page.title: 07RECREATION
page.content: In{Hucknall}we have a park called { {Titchfield Park.}In our spare time we can play tennis,cricket,bowls,golf or pitch and putt.There used to be a boating lake but now it is a childrens playground.There are five recreation grounds as well.{Hucknall Feast or {Wakes}is held on one of them.The swimming baths were given to Hucknall by{John Ellis M.P.}in 1909.There is a teaching pool at Edgewood Community School.We have just had a{Leisure Centre}built,providing about 20 activities for different age groups.There is a private{Squash {and Leisure}club. In the town there are Cubs,Scouts,Church Youth Clubs,Brownies,Guides,and Marching Bands,Boys Brigade and Discos.There is not a lot for teenagers.There are Meetings and Dancing Clubs for Over 60's.
